entries.name: Filesystem MCP Server
entries.description:
Secure file system operations server providing controlled access to directory trees.
Enables AI assistants to read, write, search, and manage files with configurable permissions.
Part of the official MCP reference server collection.

entries.name: GitHub MCP Server
entries.description:
Complete GitHub integration for AI assistants via MCP.
Manage repositories, issues, pull requests, code search, and workflows.
Enables automated repository management and collaborative development tasks.
